examples.korean: My first time having WiFi on the plane. About time! 발음듣기 비행기에서 WiFi 처음으로 해보는 중. 이제서야! DARAKWON

examples.korean: Megabus also offers wifi on many of its services, too. 발음듣기 Megabus는 wifi 역시 그들의 많은 서비스 중 하나로 제공한다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 개척자(ham6****) Web Collection
examples.english: Megabus also offers wifi on many of its services, too. 발음

examples.korean: I have just travelled on the train from London and logged in to the free wi-fi on the train. 발음듣기 나는 런던에서부터 기차로 여행해 왔고 기차에서 무료 와이파이에 로그인했을 뿐이다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 쿠인(djff****) Web Collection
examples.english: I have just travelled on the train from London and logged in to the free wi-fi on the train. 발음
